sentences.en: - [ Sighs ] - [ Marty ] Hey, Brad, you want to hear something funny?
sentences.cn: 嗨, 布拉德, 你想听些有趣的事 吗 ?

sentences.en: A redness stole into Marty's face as she mentioned Giles's name.
sentences.cn: 当玛蒂提到基尔斯的姓时,一丝红晕偷偷袭上她的面颊.

sentences.en: Among the underemployed is Marty Rasmussen of Walnut Creek, Calif.
sentences.cn: 加州的拉斯穆森(MartyRasmussen)也是就业不足者之一.

sentences.en: Call Marty, tell him to name his price.
sentences.cn: 给马蒂打电话，让他出个价儿。

sentences.en: I don't know where Marty is, but he's not dead.
sentences.cn: 我不知道马蒂在哪儿, 但他没死.

sentences.en: I don't think Marty's going to hold it against you.
sentences.cn: 我想玛蒂不会与你计数的.

sentences.en: Marty was a frequent visitor to our house.
sentences.cn: 马蒂过去是我们家的常客.

sentences.en: Marty was terrific — he just waded into the skinheads without a thought.
sentences.cn: 马蒂太棒了─他毫不含糊地揍了那些光头仔.

sentences.en: Marty: Something like that. I only wear natural fibers.
sentences.cn: 马丁: 类似吧, 我只穿天然纤维的衣服.

sentences.en: Marty: Yes, thank you, I forgot his real name.
sentences.cn: 马丁: 是的, 谢谢, 我已经忘了他的真名了.

sentences.en: So , what ever happened with marty and sandra , anyway?
sentences.cn: 对了, 马帝和桑德拉之间发生什么事了?

sentences.en: The little voice in the back of his skull said, look out for this one, Marty.
sentences.cn: 他心里在琢磨:马蒂, 对这个家伙, 你可得留点儿神.

sentences.en: This had been very quiet for one of Marty's performances.
sentences.cn: 在马蒂的表演里,这算是很平淡的一次了.

sentences.en: What did Marty say to you? I asked you to talk to him!
sentences.cn: 马蒂对你说了 什么 ?我让你和他谈谈的!

sentences.en: Why can't we just borrow some of Marty's fire?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么不能借一点马蒂的火 呢 ?
